Title: Space Race
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Joseph D. Johnston, Jeff Liu, Matt Burnett (story), Kat Morris (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: Steven, Pearl, and Greg work together to build a spaceship so that Pearl can revisit the wonders of the cosmos, but Pearl gets a little carried away.
